This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0183 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
A Active StaffActive Staff
I Inactive StaffInactive Staff

Additional Language Displays

name: ActiveInactive
title: active-inactive
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying whether a person is currently a valid staff member.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the STF segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0183 (Active/Inactive)
